St. Joseph's Hall, Leigh, Lancashire Prizes - 1st 30 and cup, 2nd £12 and cup, 3rd £8 and shield, 4th £3 and cup. March contest - 1st Walkden, 2nd Lancashire Constabulary.
April 8, 2012, 3:14 p.m. Oct. 1, 2016, 4:30 p.m.
